name: 施陽正
objective: 熱傳學主要內容是研究由於溫度梯度所造成能量傳遞之一門學問﹐為一般冷凍、空調、食品冷藏及各類型熱交換器設計之基本知識程，其他大如各類發電廠，小如電腦微晶片散熱亦有密切關係。本課程之安排以奠定學生在熱傳方面之智能，作為未來進入冷凍、空調與能源相關學門之踏腳石。
schedule:
Week 1
(1) Course outline 課程簡介；(2) Introduction to Heat Transfer 熱傳簡介；
(3) Conservation of Energy 能量守恆
Week 2
(1) Conservation of Energy (with Exercises) 能量守恆例題；
(2) Heat Conduction Equation 熱傳導方程式；(3) One-Dimensional Steady-State Heat Conduction, I  一維穩態熱傳導 (1)
Week 3
One-Dimensional Steady-State Heat Conduction, II 一維穩態熱傳導 (2)
Week 4
(1) Extended Surfaces-Fins 鰭片；(2) Exercises of One-Dimensional Steady-State Heat Conduction and Fins 一維穩態熱傳導與鰭片例題
Week 5
Transient Heat Conduction: (1) Lumped Capacity Method; (2) Conduction in Semi-infinite Domain; (3) Periodic Heating
Week 6
(1) Equations for Convection 對流方程式；(2) Order of Magnitude Analysis (or Scale Analysis) 尺寸分析
Week 7
Reynolds Analogy 雷諾類比；External Forced Convection-I 外部強制對流 (1)
Week 8
External Forced Convection-II  外部強制對流 (2)
Week 9
No class  
Week 10
Internal Forced Convection-I 內部強制對流 (1)
Week 11
Internal Forced Convection-II 內部強制對流 (2)
Week 12
Natural Convection-I 自然對流 (1)
Week 13
Natural Convection-II 自然對流 (2) ; Mixed Convection 混合對流
Week 14
(1) Basic Relations of Radiation 基本熱輻射；(2) Radiative Exchange in a Non-Participating Medium 熱輻射交換
Week 15
(1) Radiation in Long Enclosures 大空間熱輻射；(2) Radiation with Other Modes of Heat Transfer 熱輻射與其他熱傳模式
Week 16
Turbulence, I 紊流 (1)
Week 17
Turbulence, II 紊流 (2)
Week 18
No Class
scorePolicy: 作業 50%, 出席率 20%, 期末報告 30%
